price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߊ߲ߘߊߣߍ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߲ߘߦߊ ߓߎ߯ ߟߋ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
